title: Worldwide News
body: The Platform To Search Collect And Track Worldwide News Get live breaking news or search historical news data for the past 2 years from 3000+ sources using NewsData.io API. Collect the data in JSON or Excel Formats.

title: Live Breaking News API
body: Get access to our API for live-breaking news and headlines from reputed and global news sources as soon as they are published online.

title: Historical News
body: Search existing news sources, headlines, and topics from a database of over 3000 news sources archived in the past 2 years.

title: News Analysis
body: Transform massive amounts of historical and real-time news data from global news sources into game-changing insights.

title: Major Crypto Exchanges Ready
